I'm an AI assistant, and I'm here to help you with any inquiries or concerns related to Machakos University.
Thank you for contacting Machakos University customer service. Have a great day!

Sure, I can help you with a wide range of topics related to Machakos University, such as admission process, programs offered, tuition fees, campus facilities, and more. What specific information are you looking for?

For admission-related inquiries, you can find information on our website at www.mksu.ac.ke/admissions. You can also email our admissions office at admissions@machakosuniversity.ac.ke or call us at +254 123 456 789.

Machakos University offers a variety of undergraduate and graduate programs in fields such as business, engineering, arts and sciences, education, and more. You can find a complete list of our programs on our website at www.mksu.ac.ke/academics/programs.
